Home
Events/Activities
Fall
Fall at Grande Lakes
Embrace an eternal summer at Grande Lakes Orlando this autumn. Our resort offers an impressive range of activities and unique culinary experiences that will make your holiday exceptional. Designed for families and couples, the resort masterfully combines excitement and serenity, making it a dream fall destination.
View Fall Newsletter
for Fall at Grande Lakes
Featured Event
Fall at Grande Lakes
Get ready for a memorable fall at Grande Lakes with a line-up of events that the whole family will enjoy. The Da Vinci Lawn will be bustling with activities like fall crafts, laser skeet shooting, pumpkin decorating, archery, and canoeing. The amusement continues with games, face painting, a petting zoo, and a DJ. Expect charming cottages, each offering an array of food and beverage options. Plus, you'll discover unique treasures from local vendors across Central Florida, showcasing items you simply can't find anywhere else. Don't let this fall pass you by without experiencing Grande Lakes Orlando.
Tickets:
General admission is free to overnight guests, please RSVP.
Tickets must be purchased to access advanced features and exclusive activities like: laser skeet shooting, archery, and pumpkin painting.
Purchase Tickets - Fall at Grande Lakes
Purchase Tickets

Fall at Grande Lakes
Location: Da Vinci Lawn
Dates: Saturday, October 11 – Sunday, October 12, 2025
Hours: 10:00 am - 2:00 pm
Open to the public
Parking: $40 plus tax
Valet parking: $58 plus tax
Live Music: Enjoy performances that will set the perfect mood for the season.
Master Falconer Demonstrations: Witness the incredible skills of our master falconer.
Fishing with Captain Mark: Learn tips and tricks from our resident angler.
Meet Farmer Leslie: Get to know the heart and soul behind our farm-to-table experiences.
Family Lawn Games: Challenge your family to bocce ball, cornhole, chess, air hockey, foosball, ping pong and more.
Ritz Kids Animal Encounters: Meet the adorable resident animals.
Culinary Delights: Savor curated food and beverages crafted by our talented culinary team.
Magic Encounters: Be amazed by our Resident Magician, America's Got Talent Finalist, Drew Thomas!
Also, train rides, face painting and balloon artists!
Close

Turkey To Go
event details
Turkey To Go
Location: porté-cochere
Date: November 27, 2025
Time: 11:00 am – 1:00 pm
Reservation Required
buy tickets-Turkey To Go
Order Now
Order Now about Turkey To Go
For those celebrating Thanksgiving at home, The Ritz-Carlton is offering a complete holiday dinner for up to six people available for pick up on Thanksgiving day. The traditional Thanksgiving dinner includes a 14-16 pound whole roasted turkey complemented with side dishes including parker house rolls, mashed potatoes, sweet potato casserole, green bean casserole, honey glazed carrots, traditional cranberry sauce, and turkey and sage gravy with traditional stuffing. You'll also receive our Whisper Creek Farm Seminole pumpkin soup and a kale salad with cranberry vinaigrette dressing, cornbread croutons and beets. Take your pick of pumpkin pie, apple crumble, or chocolate pecan pie for dessert. Additional sides are available for purchase.
Orders may be picked up on November 27, 2025, at The Ritz-Carlton Plaza, porté-cochere.
Pick up: 11/27 at your selected time.
Close

The Magic Show: Haunted Edition
event details
The Magic Show: Haunted Edition
Select Date
buy tickets-The Magic Show: Haunted Edition
Learn More
Learn More about The Magic Show: Haunted Edition
Step into the opulent halls of The Ritz-Carlton, where luxury and legend intertwine for a spellbinding night of ghost stories, comedy, and logic-defying illusions. Join AGT Finalist Drew Thomas and his enchanting ensemble of spirits for a Halloween show unlike anything you have ever seen.
Experience a ghostly night of mind-bending magic, chilling comedy, and supernatural surprises. This is not your typical Halloween show - it's a world-class, spine tingling spectacle where spirits refuse to be ignored.
Close

Home
Events/Activities
Winter
Warm up this Holiday Season
Winter at Grande Lakes
Celebrate the festive season with friends and loved ones surrounded by the enchantment of Grande Lakes. From delicious treats to tantalizing feasts, guests will delight in a variety of festive experiences that will create memories that last a lifetime.
Book Early & Save
Festive Escape Package
Make this festive season unforgettable at Grande Lakes! Glide into excitement at our new ice skating rink, warm up by the firepits, and discover unique treasures at the Winter Wonderland Market. Relax in our cozy holiday hideaway and indulge in lavish feasts for a culinary delight. It's the perfect holiday destination, filled with festive cheer and joyful celebrations.
Festive Escape Package
The Ritz-Carlton

Experience our brand-new ice skating rink by the scenic lake with your loved ones. Skating under the winter sky is the perfect festive activity that will bring joy and happiness to everyone. So, come and join us for some winter fun!

Winter Wonderland Market
event details
Winter Wonderland Market
Da Vinci Lawn
December 12, 13, 19, 20, 26, 27
4:00pm - 8:00pm
Discover the bliss of the holiday season with our Winter Wonderland Market. Stroll amongst European-inspired cottages featuring traditional holiday delicacies, tasty beverages, and local artisan crafts. This holiday affair includes hourly snowfall and many advent surprises that the entire family will enjoy.
Close
Festive Firepit Experience
event details
Festive Firepit Experience
Da Vinci Lawn
November 27, 2025 - January 3, 2026
4:30pm - 6:30pm and 7pm - 9pm
Warm up this winter with our cozy fire pits next to the ice skating rink. Treat yourself to fresh fruit, chips & dip, and a tableside cocoa cart. Enhance your experience further with wine and champagne.
Close
Gingerbread School
event details
Gingerbread School
Location: Lobby Lounge
Dates: November 29 & 30. December 6, 7, 13, 14, 19, 20, 21, 2025
Times: 9:00 am – 11:00 am, 12:00 pm – 2:00 pm, 3:00 pm – 5:00 pm
Reservation Required
buy tickets-Gingerbread School
Reserve Now
Reserve Now about Gingerbread School
Join the pastry team to build your own gingerbread house. The fun-filled activity begins by building the house with pre-baked gingerbread panels on a wooden foundation. Then, guests can select from dozens of different types of candy and other edible details to decorate and personalize their gingerbread house.
Close
Santa’s Teddy Bear Tea
event details
Santa’s Teddy Bear Tea
Location: Lobby Lounge
Dates: December 6, 7, 13, 14, 19, 20, 21, 2025
Time: 11:00 am & 1:00 pm
Reservation Required
buy tickets-Santa’s Teddy Bear Tea
Reserve Now
Reserve Now about Santa’s Teddy Bear Tea
Sip into the holidays with the most cherished tradition. Choose from our lavish selection of teas and savor thoughtfully curated sweets and culinary delights. Engage with crafts, storytelling, live entertainment, and a special visit from Santa Claus.
Enjoy our delicious salmon, cucumber, egg and turkey sandwiches. Our tea service also offers homemade pastries and desserts, including Orange Cranberry Scones with Lemon Curd and Devonshire Cream, Strawberries with Whipped Cream and Grande Marnier, Macarons, and seasonal Tartlets.
Close
The Magic Show: Holiday Edition
event details
The Magic Show: Holiday Edition
Select Dates
buy tickets-The Magic Show: Holiday Edition
Learn More
Learn More about The Magic Show: Holiday Edition
Prepare for an extraordinary event presented by acclaimed magician and America's Got Talent finalist, Drew Thomas and his award-winning colleagues. The Magic show combines mind-bending magic, large-scale illusions, and humor to create an electrifying atmosphere. This show will captivate you with suspense and immersive audience participation, promising an unforgettable evening brimming with laughter and wonder.
Close

Special Events

Reserve Now about New Year’s Eve Firework Cabanas
Celebrate the New Year in style at the Oasis Firework Cabanas, the ultimate al fresco experience at Grande Lakes. You will enjoy a spectacular view of the lake and the fireworks, while savoring champagne and caviar. Don't miss this exclusive opportunity ring in 2025 with elegance and excitement. Reserve your Cabana today and get ready for an unforgettable night.
Close

planning
Your
trip
At Grande Lakes Orlando, every day is unique and filled with exciting opportunities. Our resort's privileged location offers guests so much variety that we made the burden of planning the ideal vacation effortless. Discover our itineraries, day trips and recommendations to enhance your Orlando retreat.

The Magic Show
Prepare for an extraordinary event presented by acclaimed magician and America's Got Talent finalist, Drew Thomas and his award-winning colleagues. The Magic Show combines mind-bending magic, large-scale illusions, and humor to create an electrifying atmosphere. This show will captivate you with suspense and immersive audience participation, promising an unforgettable evening brimming with laughter and wonder.
Book Today
for The Magic Show
Grande Lakes Sports
Adventure calls at Grande Lakes, a 500-acre tropical paradise boasting a variety of outdoor activities. Sports lovers and recreational enthusiasts alike will find plenty to enjoy. Experience the thrill of falconry, or take an eco-tour around our property. For early risers, we offer a sunrise safari, while fishing fans can spend a peaceful day fishing on our serene lakes. Let the adventure begin.
Explore
for Grande Lakes Sports
Golf Where Legends Play
The Ritz-Carlton golf course, home to the PNC Championship, is a golfer's oasis, complete with challenging greens, expansive fairways, and strategic hazards. Our recognition as a Certified Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary also highlights our dedication to environmental preservation, enhancing your gaming experience.
Learn More
for Golf Where Legends Play
Tennis & Pickle Ball
Featuring two tennis courts and two pickle ball courts, getting in the game is a breeze at Grande Lakes. Play a friendly match or take a lesson, no matter your skill or age. Break a sweat by enrolling in a tennis cardio clinic, where you'll learn the basics of the game while receiving a full cardio workout.
For court reservations and lessons call
(407) 393-4900.
photo concierge
Capture priceless moments with your loved ones with our exceptional photography service. Relish the opportunity to connect, play, and share time together in a stunning tropical setting. Reserve your photo shoot at the Photography Concierge in The Ritz-Carlton.
Book Now
Previous
Next
Bocce Ball
Take pleasure in a classic game of bocce ball on our two outdoor courts located poolside. Along with the game, enjoy the comfort of private cabanas and the breathtaking view of Grande Lake.
RESERVE - Bocce Ball
RESERVE
for Bocce Ball
Ritz Kids
Our Ritz Kids program promises to thoroughly entertain our younger guests. We offer a variety of fun and engaging activities including storytelling, animal care lessons, arts and crafts, and physical activities.
Learn More
for Ritz Kids
LOCAL
Attractions
Grande Lakes Orlando's prime location lets you explore Central Florida with ease. Enjoy popular theme parks, shopping malls, sports arenas and entertainment venues within a short drive. Plus, we offer a free shuttle bus to theme parks.
Sea World
If you're a fan of marine life, this sprawling aquatic theme park is a dream come true. Just a quick ten-minutes drive from Grande Lakes, it offers a world of immersive animal encounters, captivating shows and adrenaline-pumping rides.
Universal Orlando
The ultimate destination for Hollywood enthusiasts is within a 20-minutes from the resort. With numerous theme parks like Universal Studios for movie fans, Islands of Adventure for thrill-seekers, Volcano Bay for water enthusiasts, and City Walk for those seeking entertainment, it's a must-visit destination.
Walt Disney World
Find a world of magic and excitement at Walt Disney World, featuring seven diverse theme parks. From the futuristic Epcot and enchanting Magic Kingdom to the exotic Animal Kingdom, all are conveniently located within a 25-minute drive.
Kia Center
This versatile arena is home to the NBA's Orlando Magic and so much more. It's the pulse of entertainment in the city, showcasing concerts, comedy shows, and kid-friendly performances. Sports enthusiasts can also catch professional hockey and action-packed arena football games.
The Mall at Millenia
Orlando's premium mall is a treasure trove of over 150 retailers and restaurants. Here, you can find luxury brands such as Louis Vuitton, Tory Burch, Burberry, and Chanel, all under one roof.
The Florida Mall
This vibrant indoor mall offers a diverse mix of more than 250 retail and dining outlets. Enhanced with family-friendly attractions like the Crayola Experience, it's a prefect family day out.
Orlando Premium Outlets
Discover unbeatable discounts on top designer and retailer items at one of the country's largest outlets.
